SELECT A.NODE_ID , A.MOCK_NODE_ID , A.NODE_NM , A.NODE_ENM , A.NODE_TYPE , A.GPS_X , A.GPS_Y , A.ENTRY_RECOG_RADS , A.ADVNC_RECOG_RADS , A.USE_YN , A.UPD_DTM , A.UPD_ID , B.STTN_FCLT_TYPE
FROM BMS_NODE_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_STTN_MST B ON A.NODE_ID = B.STTN_ID
(A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001' OR A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002')
AND (NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND (A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT001' OR A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002')
AND A.NODE_TYPE = #{NODE_TYPE}
AND A.NODE_TYPE = #{NODE_TYPE}

SELECT A.FCLT_ID ,A.MAKER ,A.FCLT_KIND ,A.CLSFCTN_ID ,A.INST_LOC ,A.MODEL_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(A.BUY_DT, '%Y%m%d') BUY_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(A.INST_DT, '%Y%m%d') INST_DT ,A.FCLT_COORDS ,A.USE_YN ,A.CTR_YN ,A.REMARK ,A.NODE_ID ,A.MNG_ID ,A.FCLT_IP ,B.CLSFCTN_NM ,C.PARTNER_NM AS MAKER_NM FROM BMS_FCLT_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_EMER_CLSFCTN_MST B ON A.CLSFCTN_ID = B.CLSFCTN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BMS_PARTNER_MST C ON A.MAKER = C.PARTNER_ID
